xxl.core.spatial.geometries

Interface LinearRing2D

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Comparable<Geometry2D>, Curve2D, Geometry2D, LineString2D, Serializable

    public interface LinearRing2D
extends LineString2D
    A LinearRing is a LineString that is both closed and simple. Since it is a specialisation of a LineString it provides the same functionality.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface xxl.core.spatial.geometries.LineString2D

        getNumberOfPoints, getPoint

      • Methods inherited from interface xxl.core.spatial.geometries.Curve2D

        compareTo
